code:
flowchart LR
    %% Define the main sections
    subgraph Setup [FinTech_AuthVault]
        direction TB
        A[FinTech_LedgerService] --> B[FinTech_LedgerService]
        B --> C[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end
    
    subgraph Acquisition [FinTech_AuthVault]
        direction TB
        D[FinTech_AuthVault] --> E{FinTech_LedgerService}
        E -->|Yes| H[FinTech_AuthVault]
        E -->|No| F[FinTech_LedgerService]
        F --> H
    end
    
    subgraph Processing [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        direction TB
        I[FinTech_AuthVault] --> J[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end
    
    subgraph Analysis [FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction TB
        K[FinTech_AuthVault] --> L[FinTech_AuthVault]
        L --> M{FinTech_TransactionQueue}
        M -->|Local| N[FinTech_AuthVault]
        M -->|HPC| O[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end
    
    subgraph Reporting [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        direction TB
        P[FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> Q[FinTech_AuthVault]
        P --> R[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        P --> S[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end
    
    %% Connect the sections
    Setup --> Acquisition
    Acquisition --> Processing
    Processing --> Analysis
    N --> Reporting
    O --> Reporting
    
    %% Add logo reference (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    classDef logo fill:#fff,stroke:none
    LOGOtext[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    class LOGOtext logo
    
    %% Define visual styles
    classDef configNode fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    classDef scriptNode fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef decisionNode fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef outputNode fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    
    class B,C configNode
    class D,F,I,J,K,N,O,P scriptNode
    class E,M decisionNode
    class H,L,Q,R,S outputNode
